extendedInfo.description: Bug fixes for Magic and general useThis app sends text messages and may cost money if you exceed your limits. AUTO forward SMS to another numberAUTO respond to SMS with a SMSAUTO send SMS to a set number when you receive a callAUTO respond to calls with a SMSQUICK respond declined calls with preset SMS

reviews.comment: This was a sucky app!! Does not work.!! It forwards the messages but you still recieve them as well!! Its not good if you dont want some one to see ..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its OK, but needs ability to set contacts to groups & send custom texts based on groups/contacts. As well as ignore lists. Good concept, poor delivery
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok but...
reviews.comment: Does what it says , very clean and simple set up .  Needs to forward out going text,  to keep whole convo filed for history on receiving/ forwarded
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awwwwe man I love this. This app I def need. I just hope that soon they don\'t charge us for it like every other app that I really like does
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working on x10 and arc
reviews.comment: Didnt worked on my sonyericson arc and on sony ericson x10 didnt auto replied but used to work great on my htc magic one or two years back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app does the job. Simple, uncomplicated. Doesn\'t have countless settings. Has what you need. No problems on Evo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply Fantastic
reviews.comment: Works great. Small memory footprint. Does everything it says it can do and it does it very well. It will be a part of my standard set of apps from now on. I recommend this app highly. Great work Mike!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works most of the time, but sometimes glitches and sends out messages when on the phone and causes the phone to hang up on calls repeatedly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple no nonsense app. Sends more than 1 sms if more than 164 chr. Pl improve for 1024x600 res and support more than165 chr sms
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, works well. Would be 5 stars if there was a widget to turn auto respond on/off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Getting this set up so I can forward all calls and now texts to a cheap phone while I\'m at a music festival. Tested absolute its all good :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It worked great for me. Every phone should have this out of the box.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its ok. Kinda glitchy. Turned off randomly even when ignored by app killer. Will keep using for now. Moto Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please add ability to forward to international numbers, about 15 digits. Love this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wrks great so far does everything it says i dont use the forwarding stuff so no idea on how well that part wrks needs a widget for quick on/off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps freezing my phone. Too slow keep making me miss calls
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A++
reviews.comment: Simple and functional... that\'s the best combination.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: great app, but would like to see a widget to turn text autoresponse on/off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I had dis app once b4 n it worked fine\342\200\246now it doesnt send any texts or anything\342\200\246ugh
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well, easy to use, simple. I like.
reviews.author: A Google User
